nodes.text: The Moorja Training Installation was designed to provide refresher courses for squads from different Sector Fleets, which rotated out of the base on a weekly basis.

Located in a remote region of the planet Moorja, on the edge of crumbling badlands, its existence was kept largely a secret from the natives. The outpost contained limited facilities: a command bunker, two modular barracks, various storage sheds, a mess hall and a motor pool. A flat area was also cleared to provide landing facilities.
